name: Nicholas Litsas
bio: Nick is a senior at Michigan studying Biomedical Engineering and minoring in Mathematics. He is from Grosse Pointe, MI and is a proud brother of Beta Mu Epsilon.

name: Sophie Zhou
bio: Sophie is a senior from upstate NY studying Computer Science and minoring in Statistics and Multidisciplinary Design. In addition to being an avid NY Yankees and country music fan, she can usually be found on a walk or baking.

name: Alex Mantel
bio: Alex is a senior Chemical Engineering major from Naperville, IL. She has minors in Economics and Multidisciplinary Design. THe past two summers, she has competed in two Ironmans and will be representing the US at Ironman Worlds in Spain during Fall 2025.

name: David Ntsiful
bio: David grew up in Accra, Ghana/is from Benton Harbor, MI is a senior studying Biomolecular Science. In his free time he enjoys singing and is part of Heatbeats Acapella on campus.

name: Sam Desai
bio: Sam is a junior/senior(?) studying Computer Science and is minoring in Electrical Engineering from Allentown, PA. He is a twin.

name: Shyam Batchu
bio: Shyam is a junior/senior Mechanical Engineering major from Boise, ID. He is a Broncos fan (?). He knows how to juggle!

name: Gavin Cai
bio: Gavin is a junior studying Neuroscience and is originally from Grand Rapids, MI. On campus, he is involved in GSSA and is a brother of Pi Kappa Alpha.

name: Ryan Lee
bio: Ryan is a senior at UofM studying Chemical Engineering from Alpena, MI. After graduating, he plans on pursuing Dental School and is the official Team Flow pizza chef.

name: Alex French
bio: Alex is a Biomedical Engineering senior originally from Kalamazoo, MI. Outside of Flow, she is a member of the women's club soccer team on campus.

name: Tasuku Uraguchi
bio: Tasuku is junior/senior(?) majoring in Biomedical Engineering and minoring in Electrical Engineering(?). He grew up in New Jersey and has the best apartment lease in Ann Arbor.

name: Gia Gupta
bio: Gia is a sophomore at Michigan double majoring in Computer Engineering and Biomedical Engineering. She is from the Bay Area and loves boba.

name: Shreeyansh Tiwari
bio: Shree is a Biomedical Engineering major in his sophomore year. He is from Northville, MI (?) and likes cars.

name: George Moussa
bio: George is a sophomore Business Major at UofM originally from Kalamazoo, MI. Outside of class, he is a jazz musician.

name: Lyndsey Kim
bio: Lyndsey is a sophomore studying Biopsychology, Cognition, and Neuroscience from New Jersey.

name: Grisham Halapeti
bio: Grisham is a sophomore studying Public Health from Troy(?), MI. On campus, he is a member of Blueprints for Pangaea and the Wolveraas Dance Team.
